body_html: I had the same issue with gtx1060, win8.1, cuda8.0.60, cudnn5.0. Upgraded to the latest stable tensorflow-gpu nightly build (currently http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/nightly-win/133/) and cudnn5.1. Problem solved.
